lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Lakers have signed Coby Karl, the son of Denver Nuggets Coach George Karl. A 6-foot-5 guard, Coby Karl averaged 12.2 points in five games for the Lakers’ summer league team. He averaged 14.8 points as a senior at Boise State last season. Not selected in this year’s N.B.A. draft, he returned to the court last month, only two and a half months after having cancerous lymph nodes removed. It was his second bout with cancer in a little more than a year.
